_comment: I am using a _ instance of each field for comments.
_pushover: If you use pushover include your tokens here.
_twilio: Required data to use twilio if you want
_ngrok: This allows you to use a consistent ngrok so twilio can find it
_useUSBrelay: Set to true if you have a USB Relay board
_use_xv11: Set to true if you have an XV11 neato scanner connected.
_camera0: Set to true if you have a USB camera.
_camera0name: Run 'fswebcam --verbose --device=/dev/video0 2>&1|grep cap.card' and set this to a unique part of the resulting string.
_camera1: Set to true if you have a USB 2nd camera.
_camera1name: Run 'fswebcam --verbose --device=/dev/video1 2>&1|grep cap.card' and set this to a unique part of the resulting string.
_wait_for_door_confirmation: Set to true if you want the robot to always start disabled, waiting for you to confirm a door is shut
_hasXboxController: Set to true if you have a USB wireless xBox joystick receiver.
_hasActivityBoard: This can only be false for a 'dummy' test system that has no actual hardware.
_speechVolumeLevelDefault: Default volume level for speech. 0 to 100
-speechProgram: Set this to a script that will convert text to speech and play it. Use 'nodeSay' if you do not have one. You can also use 'espeak' if you install it on your system.
